****************************************************************** Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Issue Reported: {!Case.Description} Hello,
We wanted to update you on an issue you recently reported where orders were arriving with a shipping method of "0". This was happening if your store had the following discount rule enabled:
Buy X units in (Category A), get Y additional units in the same category free
This issue has been fixed. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have further questions. Technical support is available 24/7:
BigCommerce Support http://support.bigcommerce.com/contact
You can reply to this email or to view your case's status you can go here.
Please do not remove: {!Case.E2CP__Case_Thread_Id__c}
